hero_sub: Because fluency isn't taught — it's practiced. And real practice needs real people.
problem_card1_text: People study grammar for years but freeze when they need to actually speak. Textbooks don't prepare you for real conversations.
problem_card2_text: Gamified language apps are fun, but tapping on a screen will never replace the messy, human reality of actual conversation.
problem_card3_text: Generic courses ignore your context — your goals, your challenges, your timeline. You need something built for you.
value1_desc: We're obsessed with outcomes, not lessons. Our measure of success isn't hours completed — it's whether you got the job, led the meeting, or traveled with confidence.
value1_detail: Every session is designed around your real-world goals. Whether you're preparing for an interview, a presentation, or just want to finally sound like yourself, we build your path around what matters to you.
value2_desc: Fluency is built through practice with real humans — not pre-recorded exercises or multiple-choice quizzes.
value2_detail: Our coaches adapt to you in real-time. They push where you need pushing, slow down where you need support, and create the kind of messy, authentic conversation that actually builds confidence.
value3_desc: We understand where you're starting from. The hesitation, the patterns, the specific challenges — we've seen them before.
value3_detail: Our coaches don't just teach English — they understand the journey. Combined with world-class training methodology, we meet you where you are and take you further than you thought possible.
value4_desc: No vague promises about 'improvement.' You'll notice the difference within weeks — in your confidence, your clarity, and your voice.
value4_detail: We track real progress with practical milestones. After a few sessions, you'll find yourself speaking up in meetings, handling difficult conversations, and feeling like yourself in English.
how_subtitle: Not just coaching — a complete transformation system
how_point1_text: We pair you with a coach who understands your goals, your industry, and your learning style.
how_point2_text: Every session responds to you in real-time. No scripts, no rigid lesson plans — just focused human practice.
how_point3_text: See where you started and how far you've come. Real milestones, not arbitrary certificates.
how_point4_text: Book sessions when they work for you. Reschedule when life happens. No penalties, no guilt.
contrast_subtitle: Why we're not just another language service
proof_subtitle: What happens when real practice meets real goals
proof1_quote: I went from freezing in meetings to leading client calls. Speexify didn't teach me English — it taught me to be myself in English.
proof2_quote: Two months of coaching did what years of courses couldn't. I finally sound the way I think.
proof3_quote: The interview coaching landed me my dream job. Every session was directly applicable to my goal.
cta_sub: Stop studying. Start speaking. Your transformation begins with one conversation.
